title: All-solution-processed inorganic CsPbBr3 solar cells and their bifacial-irradiation functions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00845F, Paper
Hiroaki Daiguji, Hiroto Takano, Ibuki Watanabe, Rin Ando, Manabu Ishizaki, Masato Kurihara
In all-inorganic perovskite solar cells with solution-processed semitransparent electrodes of single-walled carbon nanotubes, bifacial irradiation largely enhances power-conversion efficiencies matching the sum of monofacial-irradiation ones.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
